Name: Bomb Voyage
About the game: Welcome to your local 'Big Box' factory. We've enlisted the help of you and your friends to test our explosive products in this game of 'reverse' hot potato! Each bomb comes with a timer before they explode! Use various tactics, across multiple factories, to steal the bomb away from your friends (local PVP), or against our bomb testing AI (single player). Can you become the ultimate explosive technician? We thank you for your time, and remember to... have a blast! Features: Local PVP play for up to 4 players Single player mode vs. robot AI Use hazards to trip up your opponents Dash and Punch to keep the bomb as long as possible
